DataElement.preferredName: Radical Prostatectomy Invasive Prostate Carcinoma Prostatic Tissue Involvement Percentage Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The percentage of prostatic tissue examined which is involved by invasive prostate carcinoma, in a radical prostatectomy specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radical Prostatectomy Invasive Prostate Carcinoma Percentage ProstaticTissue Involvement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Surgery to remove the entire prostate. The two types of radical prostatectomy are retropubic prostatectomy and perineal prostatectomy.:definition pending_A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system.  It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra.  The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Surgery to remove the entire prostate. The two types of radical prostatectomy are retropubic prostatectomy and perineal prostatectomy.:definition pending

Concepts.definition: The surgical removal of all of the prostate as well as some surrounding tissue, including lymph nodes.
A carcinoma that is not confined to the prostatic epithelium but has spread to the surrounding stroma of the prostate gland.  The vast majority of invasive prostate carcinomas are adenocarcinomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system.  It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra.  The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

Tissue composed of tubuloalveolar glands embedded in fibromuscular stroma. The stroma is smooth muscle separated by strands of connective tissue rich in collagenous and elastic fibers. The secretory alveoli of the prostate are irregularly shaped with papillary projections of the mucosa into the lumen of the gland.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
